Package Delivery

Class RefrigeratedTruck

  • java.lang.Object
    • Delivery.Truck
      • Delivery.RefrigeratedTruck

  • public class RefrigeratedTruck
extends Truck
    RefrigeratedTruck concrete class of abstract Truck. Can hold items which require temperature control between -20 and 10 degrees celsius.
    Author:
    Christopher Ayling

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      double maxTemp  
      double minTemp

      RefrigeratedTruck​()  

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      double getCost​()
      Calculate the cost of the truck using the following formula:
      w + 900 + 200*0.7^(t/5)
      Where w is the wholesale cost of all items in the truck and t is the temperature the truck maintains.
      java.lang.Double getTemperature​()
      Returns the temperature in degrees celcius that maintains a safe temperature for the trucks cargo.
      java.lang.String getTypeToString​()
      String representation of the type of truck of the concrete class.
      void loadCargo​(Item item)
      Load an item into the truck.
      void loadCargo​(Item item, int quantity)
      Load an item into the truck.
      void loadCargo​(Stock stock)
      Load all items in a stock in the trcuk.

    • Method Detail

      • loadCargo

        public void loadCargo​(Item item)
               throws DeliveryException
        Load an item into the truck. If the item's required temperature is not in the safe range a DeliveryException will be thrown.
        Overrides:
        loadCargo in class Truck
        Throws:
        DeliveryException - If the item requires a temperature outside the safe range.

      • loadCargo

        public void loadCargo​(Stock stock)
               throws DeliveryException
        Load all items in a stock in the trcuk. If the item's required temperature is not in the safe range a DeliveryException will be thrown.
        Overrides:
        loadCargo in class Truck
        Throws:
        DeliveryException - If an item requires a temperature outside the safe range.

      • loadCargo

        public void loadCargo​(Item item,
                      int quantity)
               throws DeliveryException
        Load an item into the truck. If the item's required temperature is not in the safe range a DeliveryException will be thrown.
        Overrides:
        loadCargo in class Truck
        Parameters:
        item - To load into the truck
        quantity - Quantity of specified item to be added to the truck.
        Throws:
        DeliveryException - If the item requires a temperature outside the safe range.

      • getCost

        public double getCost​()
        Calculate the cost of the truck using the following formula:
        w + 900 + 200*0.7^(t/5)
        Where w is the wholesale cost of all items in the truck and t is the temperature the truck maintains.
        Specified by:
        getCost in class Truck
        Returns:
        cost in dollars

      • getTemperature

        public java.lang.Double getTemperature​()
        Returns the temperature in degrees celcius that maintains a safe temperature for the trucks cargo. Equal to the temperature of the item in the cargo with the lowest temperature and in the range from -20 to 10 inclusive.
        Overrides:
        getTemperature in class Truck
        Returns:
        temperature In degrees celcius.

        public java.lang.String getTypeToString​()
        Description copied from class: Truck
        String representation of the type of truck of the concrete class.
        Specified by:
        getTypeToString in class Truck
        Returns:
        String
